parameter.name: systemName
parameter.description: The system name or hostname of the AS400 system.

parameter.name: userID
parameter.description: The user ID for the AS400 system

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password for the AS400 system

parameter.name: pool.poolName
parameter.description: A name for AS400 connection pool.

parameter.name: pool.maxInactivity
parameter.description: The maximum time in milliseconds of inactivity before an available connection is closed.

parameter.name: pool.maxLifetime
parameter.description: The maximum life in milliseconds for an available connection.

parameter.name: pool.maxUseCount
parameter.description: The maximum number of times a connection can be used before it is replaced in the pool.

parameter.name: pool.maxUseTime
parameter.description: The maximum time in milliseconds a connection can be in use before it is closed and returned to the pool.

parameter.name: pool.runMaintenance
parameter.description: Indicates whether the maintenance thread is used to clean up expired connections.

parameter.name: pool.threadUsed
parameter.description: Indicates whether threads are used for communicating with the host servers and for running maintenance. The default value is true.

parameter.name: pool.cleanupInterval
parameter.description: The time interval in milliseconds for running the maintenance daemon. Default value is 300000 milliseconds.

parameter.name: socket.keepAlive
parameter.description: Set value for SO_KEEPALIVE socket option. Value should be true or false.

parameter.name: socket.loginTimeout
parameter.description: Value for logging in timeout when creating a new socket connection in milliseconds.

parameter.name: socket.receiveBufferSize
parameter.description: Value for SO_RCVBUF socket option in bytes.

parameter.name: socket.sendBufferSize
parameter.description: Value for SO_SNDBUF socket option in bytes.

parameter.name: socket.soLinger
parameter.description: Value for SO_LINGER socket option in seconds.

parameter.name: socket.soTimeout
parameter.description: Value for SO_TIMEOUT socket option in milliseconds.

parameter.name: socket.tcpNoDelay
parameter.description: Value for TCP_NODELAY socket option. Value should be true or false.
